homepage.title: गोगटे कुलवृत्तांत
homepage.subtitle: Discover the rich heritage and spiritual journey of the Gogte Family

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: Know the mission of Gogte Kulavruttant Committee and get inspired!
mission.description: Our family's mission is to preserve and promote our rich cultural heritage, strengthen family bonds, and pass down our traditions to future generations.

familyTree.title: Family Tree
familyTree.subtitle: Our family tree traces back to the original ancestors of the Gogte family, preserving the rich lineage and genealogy that has been passed down through generations.

branches.title: Family Branches
branches.description: Over generations, our family has grown into multiple branches, each contributing to the rich tapestry of our collective heritage and achievements. Every branch represents a unique story of resilience, achievement, and cultural heritage.

connections.title: Family Connections
connections.description: Explore the intricate web of relationships that connect our family members across different generations and locations. These connections strengthen our bonds and preserve our shared identity.

newsEvents.title: News & Events
newsEvents.subtitle: Our family stays connected through regular updates, celebrations, and shared moments that strengthen our bonds and preserve our traditions.

celebrations.title: Family Celebrations
celebrations.description: From traditional festivals to modern celebrations, our family gatherings are filled with joy, laughter, and the warmth of shared memories.

achievements.title: Family Achievements
achievements.description: Celebrating the accomplishments of our family members in education, career, and community service that make us proud.

memories.title: Shared Memories
memories.description: Photographs and stories that capture the essence of our family life, preserving precious moments for future generations.

yogeshwaridevi.title: Yogeshwari Devi, Ambajogai
yogeshwaridevi.para1: Yogeshwari Devi, the presiding deity of Ambajogai, Maharashtra, is one of the most revered Shakti goddesses in the region. She is worshipped as the kuldevi (family goddess) by the Gogte family and many others, symbolizing divine strength, wisdom, and compassion.
yogeshwaridevi.para2: The temple's origins trace back over a millennium, with references in ancient scriptures and folklore. The idol is considered swayambhu (self-manifested) and radiates a powerful spiritual presence. The Yogeshwari Devi Temple is an architectural gem, featuring intricate carvings, grand gateways, and a sanctum that exudes serenity and devotion.
yogeshwaridevi.para3: Navratri is the most celebrated festival here, marked by vibrant rituals, music, dance, and a surge of devotees seeking the goddess's blessings. The temple is a living testament to the region's cultural and spiritual legacy, serving as a hub for religious gatherings, charity, and education.
yogeshwaridevi.para4: A visit to Yogeshwari Devi Temple offers not just spiritual fulfillment but also a glimpse into the rich traditions and enduring faith of the community. The goddess's benevolence and the temple's vibrant atmosphere leave a lasting impression on every devotee.

vyadeshwar.title: Vyadeshwar, Guhagar
vyadeshwar.para1: The Vyadeshwar Temple, nestled in the town of Guhagar, Maharashtra, is a renowned pilgrimage site dedicated to Lord Shiva. This sacred temple is a spiritual anchor for the Gogte family and countless devotees, drawing visitors from across the region for its tranquil ambiance and deep-rooted traditions.
vyadeshwar.para2: The temple is believed to be centuries old, with legends linking it to the Puranic era. Its ancient Shiva Linga is revered as Swayambhu (self-manifested). Vyadeshwar Temple boasts classic Konkani temple architecture, featuring a spacious sabhamandap, intricately carved pillars, and a peaceful courtyard shaded by old trees.
vyadeshwar.para3: The temple comes alive during Mahashivratri, Shravan, and other auspicious occasions, with elaborate rituals, abhisheks, and cultural programs. It serves as a gathering place for family events, community meetings, and religious discourses, fostering unity and cultural continuity.
vyadeshwar.para4: Visiting Vyadeshwar is not just a religious journey but an experience of serenity, devotion, and connection to one's roots. The temple's pristine surroundings and spiritual aura make it a must-visit for anyone seeking peace and blessings.
